name: The Explorer (MindGames21)
description:
The Explorer is third person action adventure level with triggers that open doors, moving platforms, enemies, hazards, and more.(There are other games called "The Explorer" but this one is superior)  Developer(Konstantinos Mouratidis) Copyright(Mind Games)  This game was made with 3d game kit unity

If you buy the game press donwload and when file donwloaded in desktop press right click and  press "extract files".Finally press 3d first game.exe and the game open! have a good time.  **You must donwload winRAR** is free
